video.title: Casper's Scare School
video.synopsis: Casper the Friendly Ghost is sent away to a boarding school that specializes in teaching young students how to be as scary as possible.

episodes.synopsis: Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! / Mantha tries to become the first zombie ever to win the Super Boo scaring competition.
episodes.title: Fang Decay / Scare Day

episodes.synopsis: When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb is a monstrous tentacle. / Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignment -- to create life.
episodes.title: Disarmed and Dangerous / Frankenleftovers

episodes.synopsis: Casper forms a secret squad dedicated to putting an end to bullying. / Casper offers to help transform Ra from a sports zero to an athletic hero.
episodes.title: Bully for You / The Ra Animator

episodes.synopsis: Alder and Dash sound the alarm after a terrifying creature threatens Scare School. / It's Grimly Day -- the grimmest day of the year!
episodes.title: Weekend at Bunny's / Grimly Day

episodes.synopsis: To win the Fright Stuff Award, Casper consults his uncles for advice. / When Ra shows up in a gold chariot, everyone wants to be his best friend.
episodes.title: Accidental Hero / Rich Kid Ra

episodes.synopsis: A medieval-themed restaurant in Deedstown gets an unfriendly visit from professor Thurdigree Burns. / Wolfie's experiment with moonlight goes awry.
episodes.title: Dragon Quest / Opposite Day

episodes.synopsis: When Frankengymteacher forms a scout troop, Casper is the first to sign up. / On a visit to Deedstown, Casper sees humans dressed as scary creatures.
episodes.title: Scare Scouts / Boo

episodes.synopsis: Casper has been helping so much, he's exhausted. / When Norman the bully obtains magical Shrinky Dust, Casper and Jimmy go on a hunt to get it back.
episodes.title: Abra-ca-deedstown / Shrinky Dust

episodes.synopsis: Casper and Jimmy plan to compete in the Deedstown Battle of the Bands. / Mantha wants to be class rep, but Kibosh wants a fellow ghost in power.
episodes.title: Bands on the Run / Vote for Casper

episodes.synopsis: Ra's parents won't let him go on the school camping trip, so he sneaks away. / Casper's lesson in taking possession of a human body goes awry.
episodes.title: Permission Impossible / What Possessed You

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas, and Casper wants to spend the holiday with Jimmy. / When Casper discovers a clock that can stop time, everyone wants to use it.
episodes.title: Merry Scary Christmas / Time Waits for No Ghost

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy's dad wants to move the family away from Deedstown. Casper tries to stop him. / The Winter Chill Dance is coming up, and Ra wants to be king.
episodes.title: Ghostbust a Move / My Fair Harpy

episodes.synopsis: Wolfie wakes up one morning to find he's turned into a human. / Casper discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.
episodes.title: Fleshed Out / Messy Business at the Manor

episodes.synopsis: When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends must bring him to the human hospital. / Casper's uncles decide to go back to Scare School.
episodes.title: Paramedic Paranormal / Back to Ghoul

episodes.synopsis: Ra is upset that no one remembered his birthday. / When Casper finds Cappy's old treasure map, he promises to help the pirate find his lost fortune.
episodes.title: 2,500 Candles for Ra / It's a Mad Mad Mad Underworld

episodes.synopsis: Ra bites into Thatch's sandwich and thinks he's turning into a vampire. / When Norman the bully comes after Jimmy, Casper helps his human friend hide.
episodes.title: Curse of the Sandwich / A Real Little Monster

episodes.synopsis: Ra neglects to read the instruction manual for his new high-tech sarcophagus. / Ra secretly uses the all-knowing Answertorium to ace a test.
episodes.title: Curse of the Sarcophagus / Whiz Kid Ra

episodes.synopsis: Ra sends himself on a terrifying interdimensional journey. / Scare School's Gloutch-raising test involves raising a cute creature into a monster.
episodes.title: Dimension Demented / Taming of the Gloutch

episodes.synopsis: When Casper encourages Quasi to go on strike, Alder and Dash make Casper take his place. / Cappy needs a first mate, and Casper's up to the challenge.
episodes.title: Ring My Bell / First Mate Casper

episodes.synopsis: When Scare School falls victim to the Baccora, the students set booby-traps. / Creature by creature, the evil Baccora robs Scare School of its powers.
episodes.title: Power Outage: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: A leprechaun steals the magical scepter that holds all of Scare School's powers. / The evil leprechaun orders Deedstown to hand over Casper's uncles.
episodes.title: Power Outage: Parts 3 & 4

episodes.synopsis: Casper is convinced his uncles stole museum artwork. / When professor Thurdigree Burns gets the dragon flu, Casper and his friends seek a cure.
episodes.title: Ghost in the Gallery / Wart on the Nose

episodes.synopsis: Casper, Mantha and Ra accidentally lead Jimmy's father to the underworld. / Alder and Dash stage a staff vs. students Slugby match.
episodes.title: Revenge of the Creature Catcher / Slugby

episodes.synopsis: Mantha intervenes when she sees a Deedstown mob attacking fellow zombies. / Mantha has a case of crypt critters but refuses to go to the nurse.
episodes.title: You Oughta Be in Pictures / Crypt Critters

episodes.synopsis: When professor Burns requires a substitute teacher, Flyboy's dad volunteers. /  A prank played on Alder and Dash results in their firing.
episodes.title: The Reflesherator / Master Blist

episodes.synopsis: The kids realize Frankengymteacher's in love. / On "take your kid to work day," Jimmy's dad invites him to to tag along as a junior ghost catcher.
episodes.title: Casper the Match Maker / Jimmy Bradley: Creature Catcher

episodes.synopsis: Casper and Jimmy want to make a scary film for the Horror Movie Festival. / Everyone is horrified when a cute rubber duck turns up in Scare School.
episodes.title: Monster Movie/Quacky Duck

episodes.synopsis: Dopplegangers: The little monsters are excited because the headmasters have given them a special zapppy control device which can make them transform into anything. They demonstrate it by turning themselves into each other. Cool! Say the kids.
episodes.title: Dopple Gangers/Totally Bats!

episodes.synopsis: Cappy finds the world truly horrifying when he gets some new eyes for his birthday. / Casper, Ra and Mantha create a scary new friend for Pumpkinhead.
episodes.title: Cappy's Mail Order Eyes/Pumpkin Pal

episodes.synopsis: Casper tries to help Prof. Burns get a day off by pretending Mosshead's toad is the professor. / Uncle Stinky and Mr. Bradley get stuck in a teapot.
episodes.title: The Day the Professor Croaked/A Potent Brew

episodes.synopsis: The Bellyache Mystery: It appears that the Sea Monster has EATEN Quasi! Naughty seamonster..
episodes.title: The Bellyache Mystery/Goodbye Jimmy

episodes.synopsis: Frankengymteacher sends the kids off to scare Deedstown's residents by using telekinesis. / The gang must find a dragon egg before it hatches.
episodes.title: The Poltergeist Assignment/The Little Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Fatso and Stretch's plan to deodorize Uncle Stinky goes awry. / Jimmy accidentally shrinks the manor -- and himself -- to the size of a hand.
episodes.title: A Haunting Smell/The Manor Has Disappeared

episodes.synopsis: Thatch is treated like a hero after Casper sprays him with a magic perfume. / Casper receives a mysterious compass that belonged to his ancestor.
episodes.title: Thatch My Idol/The Monster Catcher

episodes.synopsis: While the teachers are on a trip to the Forbidden Forest, Thatch takes over the school. / Alder and Dash are outraged when Casper rescues a kitten.
episodes.title: Home Alone/I'm Not a Hero

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Bradley is haunted by naughty dream ghost. / Casper finds a magic ring that lands him in hot water.
episodes.title: Dream Team/Curse of the Ring

episodes.synopsis: When Casper takes a picture of his uncle, he ends up trapped inside the photo. / Casper accidentally frees a giggling ghoul from the science lab.
episodes.title: Cheese!/Casper's New Friend

episodes.synopsis: Thatch hatches a sneaky plan to get great grades by putting everyone to sleep with a song. / Casper uses a typewriter that alters his words.
episodes.title: Sweet Dreams/Typewriter from Hell

episodes.synopsis: The Scare School students must give presentations on famous underworld figures. / A mix-up makes Jimmy's parents believe he's turned into a werewolf.
episodes.title: Mad-Dog McSneer/Our Boy Wolfie

episodes.synopsis: Things get out of hand when Casper meets his favorite author. / A ghost magnet causes Casper, his uncles and his grandmother to lose their powers.
episodes.title: Ghost Writer/The Ghost Magnet

episodes.synopsis: Bog monsters from the Forbidden Forest invade the school. / Believing he's invisible, Frankengymteacher plays tricks on everyone and gets suspended.
episodes.title: Invasion of the Bog Monsters/Now You See Me, Now You Don't

episodes.synopsis: Panic breaks out in Scare School after Casper accidentally concocts a love potion. / The students' stage play turns into a catastrophe.
episodes.title: Love Potion/Stage Fright

episodes.synopsis: Casper temporarily replaces a gargoyle after breaking its ear. / Thatch steals the ship-in-a-bottle model that Casper built for a competition.
episodes.title: Substitute Gargoyle/Ship in a Bottle

episodes.synopsis: An evil jack-in-the-box is determined to exact revenge on Alder and Dash. / Casper must stop an alien visitor who's turning everything into chocolate.
episodes.title: Jack Out of the Box/Casper Meets Super Choc

episodes.synopsis: Frankengymteacher is overloaded with work, so he creates a clone. / Blodge lands a radio show and spills monster secrets to the people of Deedstown.
episodes.title: Frankengymteacher's Monster/Radio Blodge

episodes.synopsis: Thatch opens a locker containing the evil spirit of pirate Davey Jones. / Casper has to dispense with Thatch the Tyrant after he becomes headmaster.
episodes.title: Davey Jones' Locker/Save Graham

episodes.synopsis: Things don't go as planned when Jimmy and Casper try to teach Norman the bully a lesson. / Casper finds a magic lantern that turns Jimmy into a ghost.
episodes.title: The Black Cat/Jimmy the Ghost

episodes.synopsis: When the figurehead from Cappy's galleon disappears, Casper and Jimmy go looking for it. / Calculizard's new tail allows him to be invisible.
episodes.title: Woodward's Day Out/Calc the Cameleon

episodes.synopsis: The whole school must unite to frighten young Fearless Freddie. / Triclops collects a set of rings to acquire superpowers.
episodes.title: Fearless Freddie/Triclops Mistress of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Thatch and his friends use as many tricks as possible to win the Great Screamboard Race. / While camping with the scouts, Jimmy disappears.
episodes.title: The Great Screamboard Disgrace/Jimmy's Trunk Call

episodes.synopsis: When Mantha dons a pair of magical shoes, they won't let her feet stop moving. / Ra makes a deal with an evil spirit in return for a good report card.
episodes.title: The Last Dance/Mummy's Boy

episodes.synopsis: Casper has to figure out how to fix a malfunctioning monster catcher. / The gang has to help Mickey find her lost foot in time for the big game.
episodes.title: To Catch a Monster/No Bones About It
